name: Vine Transit: Vine Go Paratransit
fullDescription: Vine Go is Napa County's ADA paratransit service for residents who cannot use regular Vine bus service due to a disability.
whatTheyOffer:
- Door-to-door shared ride service
- Service throughout Napa County
- Advance reservations required
- Wheelchair accessible vehicles
howToGetIt:
1. Complete the Vine Go eligibility application
2. Application at vinetransit.com
3. Assessment may be required
4. Once certified, schedule rides by phone
keywords: Vine Go, Vine Transit, paratransit, ADA, Napa County, disability, wheelchair, door to door
